description: This header file defines interfaces, constants, callback types, and documentation for a JSON-RPC HAL client implementation. It declares functions for initialization, communication, event subscription, and cleanup related to a JSON-based hardware abstraction layer client.

methods.name: json_hal_client_init
methods.description: Initializes the JSON HAL client module with a specified configuration file.

methods.name: json_hal_client_run
methods.description: Starts the client socket thread to enable communication.

methods.name: json_hal_client_send_and_get_reply
methods.description: Sends a JSON request to the server and blocks until a response is received or timeout.

methods.name: json_hal_client_send_and_get_reply_with_timeout
methods.description: Sends a JSON request and waits for a response with a specified timeout duration.

methods.name: json_hal_client_get_request_header
methods.description: Creates a JSON header message with module, version, action, and sequence ID.

methods.name: json_hal_client_subscribe_event
methods.description: Registers a callback to be invoked when a specified event occurs from the server.

methods.name: json_hal_client_terminate
methods.description: Cleans up resources and terminates the HAL client.

methods.name: json_hal_is_client_connected
methods.description: Checks if the client is successfully connected to the server.

methods.name: json_hal_get_result_status
methods.description: Parses a JSON message to extract the success or failure status.

methods.name: json_hal_get_total_param_count
methods.description: Counts and returns the total number of parameters within a JSON message.

ctags.name: event_callback
ctags.pattern: /^typedef void (*event_callback) (const char* event_msg, const int event_msg_length);$/
